items.sentence: Tom managed to cut himself while trying to open a bag of peanuts with his pocketknife.
Tom thought that there was a good chance that it was Mary who had stolen the painting.
Tom told the police that Mary had eaten at the restaurant in question before she died.
Tom usually sits at the kitchen table and eats cereal while reading the morning paper.
Tom walked over to the woman with a drink in her hand and asked her what her name was.
Tom wanted me to tell you that he was going to be away from the office for a few days.
He turned the bottle upside down and shook it, but still the honey wouldn\'t come out.
I think the reason Tom is so good at French is that he watches a lot of French movies.
Tom still lives in the same house that his parents bought when he was three years old.
Tom doesn\'t have many clothes. That\'s why you always see him wearing the same thing.
